california:
Target of the dataset:
The target variable is 'median_house_value.' It represents the median value of houses in a given California district based on the 1990 census data.

Features and explanations:
The features in the dataset are as follows:
longitude: The longitude of the district's location.
latitude: The latitude of the district's location.
housing_median_age: The median age of houses in the district.
total_rooms: The total number of rooms in the district's houses.
total_bedrooms: The total number of bedrooms in the district's houses.
population: The total population of the district.
households: The total number of households in the district.
median_income: The median income of households in the district.
ocean_proximity: A categorical feature indicating the proximity of the district to the ocean.
crab_age:
Target of the dataset: Age of the Crab (in months)

Features and Explanations:
Sex: Gender of the Crab - Male, Female, and Indeterminate.
Length: Length of the Crab (in Feet; 1 foot = 30.48 cms)
Diameter: Diameter of the Crab (in Feet; 1 foot = 30.48 cms)
Height: Height of the Crab (in Feet; 1 foot = 30.48 cms)
Weight: Weight of the Crab (in ounces; 1 Pound = 16 ounces)
Shucked Weight: Weight without the shell (in ounces; 1 Pound = 16 ounces)
Viscera Weight: Weight that wraps around your abdominal organs deep inside the body (in ounces; 1 Pound = 16 ounces)
Shell Weight: Weight of the Shell (in ounces; 1 Pound = 16 ounces)
dubai:
Target of the dataset:
The target of the dataset is 'price' which represents the market price of the apartments.

Features and Explanations:
The dataset contains the following features and their corresponding explanations:

id: Property ID
neighborhood: Neighborhood name
latitude: Location data (latitude)
longitude: Location data (longitude)
size_in_sqft: Covered area of the apartment (in square feet)
price_per_sqft: Price per square feet for the apartment
no_of_bedrooms: Number of bedrooms in the apartment
no_of_bathrooms: Number of bathrooms in the apartment
quality: Quality based on the number of amenities, categorized as Ultra, High, Medium, and Low.
gem_price:
Target of the dataset: Price (the Price of the cubic zirconia)

Features and explanations:
Carat: Carat weight of the cubic zirconia.
Cut: Describe the cut quality of the cubic zirconia. Quality is in increasing order from Fair, Good, Very Good, ...
Color: Colour of the cubic zirconia. With D being the best and J the worst.
Clarity: Cubic zirconia Clarity refers to the absence of the Inclusions and Blemishes. (In order from Best to Worst)
Depth: The Height of a cubic zirconia, measured from the Culet to the table, divided by its average Girdle.
Table: The Width of the cubic zirconia's Table expressed as a Percentage of its Average Diameter.
X: Length of the cubic zirconia in mm.
Y: Width of the cubic zirconia in mm.
Z: Height of the cubic zirconia in mm.
heloc:
Target: Risk Performance

Features:
    External Risk Estimate
    Months Since Oldest Trade Open
    Months Since Most Recent Trade Open
    Average Months in File
    Number of Satisfactory Trades
    Number of Trades 60+ Ever 2 Derogatory Public Records
    Number of Trades 90+ Ever 2 Derogatory Public Records
    Percent Trades Never Delinquent
    Months Since Most Recent Delinquency
medical_cost:
Target of the dataset:
The target of the dataset is 'charges,' which represents individual medical costs billed by health insurance.

Features and Explanations:

age: Age of the primary beneficiary.
sex: Insurance contractor gender, either female or male.
bmi: Body mass index, providing an understanding of body weight relative to height (kg/m^2).
children: Number of children covered by health insurance or number of dependents.
smoker: Indicates whether the individual is a smoker or not.
region: The beneficiary's residential area in the US, categorized into northeast, southeast, southwest, or northwest.
salary:
The target of the dataset is Salary. 
 Features and their explanations:
    Age: The age of the individuals in the dataset, representing their chronological age in years.
    Gender: The gender identification of the individuals, indicating their gender or gender identity.
    Education Level: The highest level of education attained by the individuals, indicating their educational qualifications or degree.
    Job Title: The occupation or job title of the individuals, specifying their professional role or position.
    Years of Experience: The number of years of professional experience accumulated by the individuals in their respective fields.
    Country: The country of residence or origin of the individuals, providing geographical information.
    Race: The racial background or ethnicity of the individuals, reflecting their specific racial or ethnic group.
